Title: 3D Object Manipulation in a Single Image using Stock 3D Models
PDF availability (beside dl.acm): On the author(s) website or its institution
Availability: on the authors website or project page (zip file, direct download...)
License type: Special license SOFTWARE LICENSE AGREEMENT ACADEMIC OR NON-PROFIT ORGANIZATION NONCOMMERCIAL RESEARCH USE ONLY...
Documentation: User-documentation (readme-note-tutorial) more than just build instructions
General comments:
I was able to download and run some executables on an old MacOS (Sierra). The 3D manipulation and rendering tool works perfectly on the provided example but I was not able to run the other tools (Alignment and illumapp tools) due to version issues in the required dynamic libs (opens): 

./Release/Alignment.app/Contents/MacOS/Alignment ./examples/chair/
dyld: Library not loaded: lib/libopencv_imgproc.2.4.dylib
  Referenced from: /Users/tmp/Downloads/OM3D_1.0.2/./Release/Alignment.app/Contents/MacOS/Alignment
  Reason: image not found
Misc. comment:
The source code is available upon request ( https://www.cs.cmu.edu/~om3d/sourcecode.html).
If the "I agree" button doesn't show (it was not visible on my Chrome, nor IE), you can press it by going to http://sites.cs.cmu.edu/om3d/test.php
